title: Jake "Spawn" Tiberi - AMA
body:
Hi I'm Jake Tiberi, you may remember me from such broadcasts as, the OPL, LPL En, MSI or Worlds 2015. I am the lead shoutcaster at Riot Oceania, and am here today to answer anything!?

https://twitter.com/Spawnlol

A little more information about me before we start:

I have been casting for about 3 years now I believe, and lucky enough to do 18 months with Riot Games.
I am a huge gamer, favourite games, not called league of legends, would be Final Fantasy, Suikoden, Warcraft 2/3 and if we go very old school Quest for Glory. I also enjoy reading fantasy, currently reading the Dwarfs books, but loved Feist's Magician series, and Edding's Balgariad.
I have watched every Worlds championship (AP Alistair OP) and the WCG's (RIP Rusty) and historically was a huge TSM fan.
Before esports I spent 3 years working in insurance in Melbourne - weird career change I know.

So AMA! Lets go

replies.body: Why did you decide to look like me?
Have you seen you!? why would I not want to look like you!? <3
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
The real question is, can Rusty grow a beard?
Answer is NO! I'm finally free!
Same, you clone, Spawn. {{champion:7}}  {{champion:62}}   {{champion:35}}

Hey spawn big fan of your work. 
Firstly how did you eventually get picked up by riot after casting for 3 years previously also.
Personally I have a dilema between top tier play and the higher end of casting and they ussually collide would you have any advice on that topic 
Regards Pune

> [{quoted}](name=VR Pune,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OmR9kPAB,comment-id=001f,timestamp=2016-01-13T06:40:32.423+0000)
>
> Hey spawn big fan of your work. 
> Firstly how did you eventually get picked up by riot after casting for 3 years previously also.
> Personally I have a dilema between top tier play and the higher end of casting and they ussually collide would you have any advice on that topic 
> Regards Pune

Hey Pune,

I would say do what you are passionate about. In the end I was never passionate enough to get mechanically good enough at the game. Never was really :) but I loved the theory crafting and public speaking so Analyst / Coach / Caster made the most sense to me.

I got picked up by Riot by getting a try out through Atlus, and then trying to work on everything I could. Nowadays its probably easier, reach out to Julian (pastrytime) or myself with your work. we can get you in contact with some cool people.

Hope this helps and never give up <3

Cheers

On a more serious note, huge fan of you and Rusty here :) I give you guys props in every reddit thread (GoDyrusGo) because your analysis is always teaching me something when I watch, sometimes small details that I'm like "damn good point!" Definitely hope you two get more visibility through 2016. Congrats btw on Worlds :)

Even cooler that you're a fan of Raymond E Feist's Magician books and David Edding's BElgariad. Those are some of the first fantasy books I grew up with man. Did you read the Mallorian too? Belgarath was such a chief, probably my first favorite fantasy character. I still remember when he solo beasted Ctuchik in book 3. He fascinated me as a kid like a super saiyan did for others. I had to reread the passage several times it was so sick. Also liked the thief prince, Keldar I think his name was.

What's been your favorite final fantasy? Those are the RPGs I got started on as a kid, played 4, 6, 7, 9 and 12. Tried 8 halfway but I found the Junction system too tedious and I was on a rom at that point so the game in general was outdated as a newcomer. You ever play Xenogears? If you're cooking for a retro RPG, and since it seems we might have similar tastes in style, let me tell you that the plot in Xenogears is hands down the best I've ever encountered in a video game and totally worth checking out if you're into that thing.

Awesome that you're (or began as) a TSM fan too. I've been since S1. Currently doing grad school abroad in Germany for chemistry and struggling to find joy. I love esports though; it's been my consistent hobby for a couple years now. Since you made such a radical career shift yourself, could you share the details of how you managed it if you get a chance? It's hard to find time myself being busy with school, but it's still nice to read these stories.

Cheers man and thanks for the read. Good luck in 2016!

Hey KSHarrison,

Thanks for the Love man! We try to teach and entertain, and hearing people thank us for it makes our day! <3

Yeah I did read the Mallorian, and the Ellenium I think its called (same author new characters). Eddings is baller! Kheldar is a beast (silk the thief). Definately my favourite character from the books.

Final Fantasy 9 is probably the fave from the series. The game play was super fast and fun.

Havent played XenoGears, but I will definately check it out.

My story is weird. I started on the NA server as a diamond player and made a team. A high elo player thought I would be a good pick up (he was very wrong! ;) ) and I played some local tournaments and online stuff. When I got a fulltime jobe (season 2) I went back to casual, and met Atlus through a friend. From there I casted some stuff and he recomended Riot try me out. Last year, with OPL kicking off and LPL needing a team I was picked up fulltime. 

Theres obviously lots more to it, but it was honestly about not giving up and chasing it.

Thanks for the questions and hopefully see you round :D

Why do you try to look like Rusty?

(PST: It's @BeFairPlz on Twitter and Rusty made me do it.)

Hey Spawn, love the casting!

Few questions from me,

What made you decide to make shoutcasting your career?
Did you have any inspirations when you started?
Have you cast any games other than LoL?
Why did you decide to look like RUSTY???

{{summoner:11}}
can you teach me how to take selfies pls

> [{quoted}](name=Loote,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OmR9kPAB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-13T02:19:46.810+0000)
>
> can you teach me how to take selfies pls

I would also like to learn this essential skill.

Its all about angle and the smirk. 2 core components! also helps if you have no shame of taking them in public!

But beware - friends will get jealous and try and photo bomb you, at this point you need to have reflexes of a mongoose to not be trolled!
Well i think i'll start with the really easy one, If you could rank the OPL teams for next split, Who would come where ((Might as well do LPL as well since someone else will ask that :P ))

Ranking teams is hard. I prefer to do it in groups (see below). This is my opinion only! let me know if you have questions as to why?!

OPL
S Tier - Chiefs, LGC
A Tier - DW, Sin
B Tier - Trident, HLN
C Tier - AV, Infernum

LPL
S Tier - EDG, LGD, QG
A Tier - VG, RNG, Snake
B Tier - iG (Rip), M3, WE
C Tier - OMG, HYG, EPA

Cheers for the question

> [{quoted}](name=The Real Spawn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OmR9kPAB,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-01-13T02:49:39.345+0000)
>
> Ranking teams is hard. I prefer to do it in groups (see below). This is my opinion only! let me know if you have questions as to why?!
> 
> OPL
> B Tier - Trident
> 

We will not forget this :<

> [{quoted}](name=Trident Sheep,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OmR9kPAB,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2016-01-13T05:40:48.179+0000)
>
> We will not forget this :<

Hey Sheep.

This was actually a hard one. I debated it alot with Rusty and my gut feel is Trident is a dark horse to blow everyone away so I really hope you guys take this into the season.

Pacman in my opinion is one of the most improved players coming into the split, and I really enjoy his stream :) Also really looking forward to seeing Impaired finally play on the top level. 

Cheers

> [{quoted}](name=The Real Spawn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OmR9kPAB,comment-id=0002000000010000,timestamp=2016-01-13T06:12:37.399+0000)

> Pacman in my opinion is one of the most improved players coming into the split, and I really enjoy his stream :) Also really looking forward to seeing Impaired finally play on the top level. 
> 
> Cheers

Can you please provide a link to his stream?

ty :)
any reason Why you rate AV So Low on the list , weren't they top 4 last split?

Hey Thunder,
I just think that the Av going into this split is vastly different and teams have continued to level up. In my opinion Av's 2 biggest strengths were Jungle and Top and these were relatively weak roles in OCE last split. I think top lane particularly this split is much more competitive and therefore the other teams surpass them.
Cheers
Last question here, what is the best way to get into esports as a caster/analyst or anything in general and how was your road to becoming the head caster of Oceania?

Hey Support,

Best way to get making content. Do vod analysis. have an opinion, and share it via video or written pieces. Casting its always cool if you can find an opposite pairing to share your passion and cast with you, then cast local stuff.

I think I answered the question for how I got into Riot, but what I didnt mention is I also volunteered a fair bit. at the start you have to prove your worth. I volunteered as a caster for tournaments, and for teams as an analyst and eventually it worked out for me.

Cheers

Hey Spawn

What was the biggest step up for you in your casting career (aside from changing yourself to look like Rusty)?

First trip to NA. it was just before worlds and got to meet all the talent. they gave me a heap of advice and watching them prep I feel took me to the next level.

Also got to cast Keane take on CLG which was super fun!
Rad! I'm gunning for OCS this year with my co-caster Smite so it's cool to get a window into the world beyond 'amateur caster'

I've seen some of your work actually Pixie. biggest advice for getting better and beyond casting is practice.

Also always feel free to reach out to us (me atlus, pastry, rusty) we love to watch you guys grow and if you have feedback on us as well dont be shy!

Hey Spawn call me DJ Khalid cuz here's another one, are you proud to be the head shout caster at Oceania and have you ever gotten any offers from EU, NA, LPL, or even LCK or is it just all International tournaments and having the lowest win pick % at worlds? {{champion:63}} feel the burnsss

Hey Support :D

I am so proud of the team we have here in Oceania. When I look at the work we output its great to see how far we have come, but also how much we can still grow. 

The Riot offices actually work really closely together to assign talent to the place they will grow the most, work the best, and enjoy themselves. We took Sata on last split for this exact reason from the NA team. For me that is the OCE office right now. I love the OPL and working on the LPL is definitely a huge passion project for me. In saying that I also love to be able to participate in international tournaments representing the IWC regions and LPL - they are great fun.

My pick % was horrid during groups, but like a fine wine i think i got better afterwards. iG and LGD kinda did a number on me huh!

What needs to happen for OMG to become a competitive team again? They blew it with one of the most stacked rosters in LPL history and they've just picked up TBQ -- does the 'Chinese players only' philosophy need to end?

Hey Alex,

I dont think so. I think China proved in the past they can compete. Honestly with OMG i think they are in the right direction, newer talent, 2 veterans in Cool and TBQ and start to rebuild. League has proven its about the long haul, they will struggle for a split or 2 but super teams have continually failed split one (see them last year) so whats the harm in trying a new approach?

Cheers,

Well hello there...

1.  Is working with new casters/analysts on camera something that has become easier for you over your years of casting?
I noticed during the 2015 world championship while you were on the analyst desk, that Tabe seemed to be nervous and uneasy on the camera and you asked him direct questions that you knew he could elaborate on. Was this your intention to make him more at ease, or did I miss read the situation?

2.	Which was your favorite 

Final Fantasy game?
Character in the Belgaraid series?

Hi Ottoke, 

How are you doing man!

1a) Yes this is something the more you do and practice the better you get! I love trying to push myself to be great at what I do, and I'm not there yet with casting but will always strive to get better.

1b) Tabe. We talked a heap off screen (as I also did with yamato). I knew he was struggling and I wanted his thoughts. Asking direct questions means he can talk to me (easy) and not the camera (very hard!). I hope it made it easier for him to convey his wealth of information. I mean who doesnt want to hear from one of the great support players

2a) I loved 4, but honestly 7/9 win hands down for me. 7 for story, 9 had the best game play

2b) Silk / Amber / Prince Kheldar! What a beast.

Cheers man.
Which team (one for each of OPL and LPL if you have them) will surprise against the general consensus, whether it's a pleasant surprise or a possible underperformance?

Hi Plubby!

Trident (I think they have potential to be great)
RNG (this team - if the stars align will destroy teams - or they will be SHRC and King and get relegated trying to figure it out)

what do you think?
What made you want to become a Shoutcaster?

Honestly, Love for league of legends. I played for ever! Then there was a shot to talk about it.

During my first run through I casted people I once played with and I was hooked!

from their it was about entertaining the viewer. I love when I get people cheering for / against me, or passionately telling me I dont know what Im talking about or I do. It makes the job very fun!
Why do you try to look like RUSTYtheBIASEDagainstERGET ?
All riot colour casters are bred to look this way. Kobe first, then me, Rusty and Stress. #conspiracytheorys

Hi Yuzuki.
Thanks for keeping a steady name so I always know who you are! /s
I am all of the above!

<3 Duo?
hey im 2 games off diamond! I'll get there and then you have no excuse
What are your predictions for other regions like NA and EU

My prediction for NA is TSM!!! I also think Cloud 9 will be impressive to watch play - remind me alot of QG actually (style not skill).

For EU - since worlds I've fallen head over heels for Niels (Zven?). I think OG and Fnatic will continue to dominate.
